name: Doom (itch) (TG20)
description:
Doom is a classic fps game developed by ID Software in 1993.

Controls: w or up arrow: forward. s or down arrow: backwards. d or right arrow: look right. a or left arrow: look left. SPACEBAR: shoot. [ctrl]: open doors.

cheats: IDDQD - Invulnerability. IDKFA - Full health, ammo, weapons, armor and keys.
